text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Five days left until tryouts...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The shoes I ordered—ones durable<n>enough to withstand
Oguri Cap's<n>devastating power—finally arrived, so<n>I head
over to give them to her.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: New shoes? For me?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: ...But why? I'm not even your trainee<n>yet.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I tell her about the conversation I had<n>with Tamamo Cross
and how tryouts<n>are where a student proves her true<n>
worth by giving it her all.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Tama said that? I see. So that's how<n>tryouts work.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Got it. Thanks for the shoes. I'll break<n>them in as I practice
for the race.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Oguri Cap accepts the shoes, after<n>which I decide to keep
an eye on her<n>as she takes them for a spin.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Huff, huff...Haha... Hahahaha!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: This is amazing! My legs... are light as<n>feathers!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Thank you again for the shoes.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: They're... absolutely perfect. I'll take<n>good care of them.
choice_data_list: I'm just glad to see you running so happily.
I'm just glad to see you running so happily.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: H-huh? What—?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: It's no big deal... I think. It's just...<n>Uh...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: What you said. It felt really... familiar...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: It's nothing. Don't worry about it.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
In any case, thank you one last time<n>for the shoes. I
promise to pull out all<n>the stops come tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Five days pass, and the time for<n>tryouts finally arrives.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Running today is not only Oguri Cap<n>but also another student
rumored to<n>be just as fast and skilled—Super<n>Creek.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The podiums are absolutely buzzing<n>with excitement. If I
didn't know any<n>better, I'd think this is a G1 race.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Wow. There sure are a lot of people<n>here today.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: You're right. Are tryouts always like<n>this?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
No, actually. It's quite unusual to have<n>this large of an
audience... I wonder if<n>there's some celebrity here today.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: A celebrity? That would explain the<n>crowd.

text_block_list.name: Tryouts Staff A
text_block_list.text: Super Creek, please get ready for the<n>race!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Yes, ma'am! I'll be right there! I have<n>to go now.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: See ya.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Wait, who even was that?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The two are completely oblivious to all<n>the attention they're
garnering.<n>Although maybe in this case,<n>ignorance is
bliss...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Not that it matters. Once they start<n>racing, the crowd roars
with<n>excitement, and it's clear why<n>everyone's here
today.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Oguri Cap is closing the gap! She<n>isn't wasting a single
second!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Almost there! She's taking the lead!<n>But wait! Creek is
speeding up! Will<n>she be able to lose Oguri?! It's gonna<n>be
a close match! Who will win?! Oguri<n>or Creek?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Oguri ends up in second place behind<n>Super Creek, who
won by a mere<n>fraction of a second.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Second place... Huh...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I got brand-new shoes... and ran as<n>fast as I could... But I
still got second...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
This place really is something else.<n>Once I debut, I'll be able
to race even<n>more rivals like Tama and Creek...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: This is awesome... and exciting!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Nice job, Oguri Cap! You were<n>amazing!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Indeed. Very impressive. I'm<n>currently looking to recruit
more<n>talented runners to train under my<n>tutelage, if you're
interested...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Ah, right... I need to get scouted<n>before I can make my
debut...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Thanks, but... Sorry, I'll have to<n>decline. Excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Oguri Cap awkwardly wades through<n>the crowd and makes
her way<n>towards me.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: ...Did you watch the race?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Th-thanks.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Um... yeah, it has to be you.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I have a favor to ask. Would you be<n>my trainer?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
The guidance you gave and your<n>words of support... They
felt genuine.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Praise or criticism, you're genuine<n>like the folks back home.
It feels nice.<n>Really takes me back.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Even though I'm far from home, as<n>long as you're my
trainer, I feel like I<n>can ease my mind and put my all into<n>
running.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: So... how about it? Would you please<n>be my trainer?
choice_data_list: Yeah! Let's make everyone back home proud!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: ...Of course! I wouldn't want anything<n>less. Let's do it!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: All right. First things first...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Growl...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: ...Let's grab something to eat.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With nothing other than food on her<n>mind, we depart in
search of<n>sustenance. My days of training Oguri<n>Cap have
only just begun!
